com.microsoft.azure.management.datalake.store.uploader

Class UploadParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.datalake.store.uploader.UploadParameters

  • public class UploadParameters
extends Object
    Represents parameters for the DataLake Uploader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
        UploadParameters(String inputFilePath, String targetStreamPath, String accountName)
      Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader with optional values set with their defaults.
      protected UploadParameters(String inputFilePath, String targetStreamPath, String accountName, boolean useSegmentBlockBackOffRetryStrategy, int threadCount, boolean isOverwrite, boolean isResume, boolean isBinary, long maxSegmentLength, String localMetadataLocation)
      Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader used for unit testing.
        UploadParameters(String inputFilePath, String targetStreamPath, String accountName, int threadCount, boolean isOverwrite, boolean isResume)
      Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader with the following optional values set with their defaults.
        UploadParameters(String inputFilePath, String targetStreamPath, String accountName, int threadCount, boolean isOverwrite, boolean isResume, boolean isBinary, long maxSegmentLength, String localMetadataLocation)
      Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader.
        UploadParameters(String inputFilePath, String targetStreamPath, String accountName, int threadCount, boolean isOverwrite, boolean isResume, String localMetadataLocation)
      Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader with the following optional values set with their defaults.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAccountName()
      Gets a value indicating the name of the account to upload to.
      String getDelimiter()
      Gets a value indicating the record boundary delimiter for the file, if any.
      Charset getFileEncoding()
      Gets a value indicating the encoding of the file being uploaded.
      String getInputFilePath()
      Gets a value indicating the full path to the file to be uploaded.
      String getLocalMetadataLocation()
      Gets a value indicating the directory path where to store the metadata for the upload.
      long getMaxSegementLength()
      Gets the maximum length of each segement in bytes.
      String getTargetStreamPath()
      Gets a value indicating the full stream path where the file will be uploaded to.
      int getThreadCount()
      Gets a value indicating the maximum number of parallel threads to use for the upload.
      boolean isBinary()
      Gets a value indicating whether the input file should be treated as a binary (true) or a delimited input (false).
      boolean isOverwrite()
      Gets a value indicating whether to overwrite the target stream if it already exists.
      boolean isResume()
      Gets a value indicating whether to resume a previously interrupted upload.
      boolean isUseSegmentBlockBackOffRetryStrategy()
      Gets a value indicating whether [to use segment block back off retry strategy].
      protected void setThreadCount(int threadCount)
      Internally sets the number of threads that are allowed for the upload.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UploadParameters

        public UploadParameters(String inputFilePath,
                        String targetStreamPath,
                        String accountName)
        Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader with optional values set with their defaults. Defaults are as follows: threadCount = 1 isOverwrite = false isResume = false isBinary = true maxSegmentLength = 256mb localMetadataLocation = File.createTempFile()
        Parameters:
        inputFilePath - The full path to the file to be uploaded.
        targetStreamPath - The full stream path where the file will be uploaded to.
        accountName - Name of the account to upload to.

      • UploadParameters

        public UploadParameters(String inputFilePath,
                        String targetStreamPath,
                        String accountName,
                        int threadCount,
                        boolean isOverwrite,
                        boolean isResume)
        Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader with the following optional values set with their defaults. Defaults are as follows: isBinary = true maxSegmentLength = 256mb localMetadataLocation = File.createTempFile().
        Parameters:
        inputFilePath - The full path to the file to be uploaded.
        targetStreamPath - The full stream path where the file will be uploaded to.
        accountName - Name of the account to upload to.
        threadCount - The maximum number of parallel threads to use for the upload.
        isOverwrite - Whether to overwrite the target stream or not.
        isResume - Indicates whether to resume a previously interrupted upload.

      • UploadParameters

        public UploadParameters(String inputFilePath,
                        String targetStreamPath,
                        String accountName,
                        int threadCount,
                        boolean isOverwrite,
                        boolean isResume,
                        String localMetadataLocation)
        Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader with the following optional values set with their defaults. Defaults are as follows: isBinary = true maxSegmentLength = 256mb
        Parameters:
        inputFilePath - The full path to the file to be uploaded.
        targetStreamPath - The full stream path where the file will be uploaded to.
        accountName - Name of the account to upload to.
        threadCount - The maximum number of parallel threads to use for the upload.
        isOverwrite - Whether to overwrite the target stream or not.
        isResume - Indicates whether to resume a previously interrupted upload.
        localMetadataLocation - Indicates the directory path where to store the local upload metadata file while the upload is in progress. This location must be writeable from this application. Default location if null: File.createTempFile()

      • UploadParameters

        public UploadParameters(String inputFilePath,
                        String targetStreamPath,
                        String accountName,
                        int threadCount,
                        boolean isOverwrite,
                        boolean isResume,
                        boolean isBinary,
                        long maxSegmentLength,
                        String localMetadataLocation)
        Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader.
        Parameters:
        inputFilePath - The full path to the file to be uploaded.
        targetStreamPath - The full stream path where the file will be uploaded to.
        accountName - Name of the account to upload to.
        threadCount - The maximum number of parallel threads to use for the upload.
        isOverwrite - Whether to overwrite the target stream or not.
        isResume - Indicates whether to resume a previously interrupted upload.
        isBinary - Indicates whether to treat the input file as a binary file (true), or whether to align upload blocks to record boundaries (false).
        maxSegmentLength - The recommended value is 256mb, which gives optimal performance. Modify at your own risk.
        localMetadataLocation - Indicates the directory path where to store the local upload metadata file while the upload is in progress. This location must be writeable from this application. Default location if null: File.createTempFile()

      • UploadParameters

        protected UploadParameters(String inputFilePath,
                           String targetStreamPath,
                           String accountName,
                           boolean useSegmentBlockBackOffRetryStrategy,
                           int threadCount,
                           boolean isOverwrite,
                           boolean isResume,
                           boolean isBinary,
                           long maxSegmentLength,
                           String localMetadataLocation)
        Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLake Uploader used for unit testing.
        Parameters:
        inputFilePath - The full path to the file to be uploaded.
        targetStreamPath - The full stream path where the file will be uploaded to.
        accountName - Name of the account to upload to.
        useSegmentBlockBackOffRetryStrategy - if set to true [use segment block back off retry strategy].
        threadCount - The maximum number of parallel threads to use for the upload.
        isOverwrite - Whether to overwrite the target stream or not.
        isResume - Indicates whether to resume a previously interrupted upload.
        isBinary - Indicates whether to treat the input file as a binary file (true), or whether to align upload blocks to record boundaries (false).
        maxSegmentLength - The recommended value is 256mb, which gives optimal performance. Modify at your own risk.
        localMetadataLocation - Indicates the directory path where to store the local upload metadata file while the upload is in progress. This location must be writeable from this application. Default location if null: File.createTempFile()

        public boolean isUseSegmentBlockBackOffRetryStrategy()
        Gets a value indicating whether [to use segment block back off retry strategy].
        Returns:
        true if [to use segment block back off retry strategy]; otherwise, false.
